title: Warning and specifications on a tyre wall (GT Radial) thank you
content:
Would any one be able to tell me what this typeface might be. It looks pretty simple and is probably quite obvious (I'm new to this). Thank you

Font: 

 Planscribe NF 

Solved By: 

 [oldnick](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415065345/http:/typophile.com/user/6470 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [for\_font\_crop\_web.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415065345/http:/typophile.com/files/for_font_crop_web.jpg) | 270.28 KB |
| [for\_font\_crop\_small.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415065345/http:/typophile.com/files/for_font_crop_small.jpg) | 284.54 KB |
author: rider_rebooted

comments.content:
It looks like Leroy template lettering, three versions of which are here...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/planscribe-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415065345/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/planscribe-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/planscribe-nf/")
Thanks Nick, that's great! There are some subtle differences but it's perfect for the job. Yours will be the first in my serious collection of fonts :-)
